org.yamcs.http.api

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.http.api.Context

  • public class Context
extends Object
    Request context used in RPC-style endpoints.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public final int id
        Unique id for this call.

      • nettyContext

        public final io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext nettyContext
        The Netty request context for an RPC call. In general RPC implementation should avoid using this object. It is exposed only because we need it for some HTTP-specific functionalities that are not covered by our RPC implementation (e.g. http chunking)

      • nettyRequest

        public final io.netty.handler.codec.http.FullHttpRequest nettyRequest
        The Netty HTTP request for an RPC call. In general RPC implementations should avoid using this object. It is exposed only because we need it for some HTTP-specific functionalities that are not covered by our RPC implementation (e.g. multipart uploading)

      • user

        public final User user
        The request user.
